tuv.seg: The Household Charge has been replaced by the Local Property Tax (LPT). Unpaid Household Charge is now being collected through the LPT system
Tá Cáin Mhaoine Áitiúil ar mhaoin chónaithe ag teacht in ionad an Mhuirir eatramhaigh Theaghlaigh a tugadh isteach in 2012
Non-Principal Private Residence Charge (NPPR)
Muirear ar Áit Chónaithe Phríobháideach Neamhphríomha (NPPR)
The NPPR charge has been abolished but late fees apply to unpaid amounts. Further penalties apply to amounts that were still outstanding on 1 September 2014
An muirear rialtais áitiúil bliantúil ar áit chónaithe phríobháideach neamhphríomha, mar shampla réadmhaoin phríobháideach ar cíos agus tithe saoire
Management companies for apartment blocks
Cuideachtaí bainistíochta do bhloic árasán
An owners' management company must be set up before the developer of an apartment block sells any units
Ní mór cuideachta bainistíochta úinéirí a bheith bunaithe sula ndíolann réalóir bhloc árasán aonad ar bith
Renting out a room in your home
Ag ligean seomra i do theach amach ar cíos
Rent-a-room relief makes it possible to earn tax-free rental income when you rent out a room in your home to private tenants
Is féidir seomra i do theach a ligean ar cíos agus faoiseamh cánach a fháil
How to buy out ground rent on your property
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar chíos talún agus conas cíos talún ar d'áitreabh a cheannach amach
Inspection of septic tanks and other domestic waste water treatment systems
Iniúchadh umair sheipteacha agus córais chóireála fuíolluisce tí eile
Registration and inspection of septic tanks and other domestic waste water treatment systems
Clárú agus iniúchadh umar seipteach agus córais eile chóireála fuíolluisce tí
What is considered to be a family or shared home?
Teach an teaghlaigh agus tithe comhroinnte
Find out the orders that can be made by the courts in relation to the family or shared home
Céard atá i gceist le teeach an teaghlaigh agus na horduithe gur féidir a dheanamh ina leith
This document is in: Family and Relationships > Separation, divorce and dissolution
This document is in: Teaghlach agus Caidrimh > Scaradh, colscaradh agus díscaoileadh
Property rights of cohabiting couples
Cearta maoine lánúineacha comhchónaithe
Property rights of cohabiting couples relating to buying a home, private rented accommodation, local authority housing, and the Family Home Protection Act
Pléann an cháipéis seo na cearta maoine atá ag lánúineacha comhchónaithe maidir le tithíocht údaráis áitiúla, cóiríocht phríobháideach ar chíos agus an tAcht um Chosaint Tí an Teaghlaigh
This document is in: Family and Relationships > Cohabiting couples
This document is in: Teaghlach agus Caidrimh > Lánúineacha comhchónaithe
Property rights and the breakdown of a relationship
Cearta maoine agus cliseadh ar chaidreamh
This document discusses whether spouses and cohabiting partners have any property rights following the breakdown of their relationship
Pléann an cháipéis seo cibé an bhfuil aon chearta maoine ag céilí agus comhchónaitheoirí, tar éis cliseadh ar a gcaidreamh
This document is in: Family and Relationships > Problems in marriages and other relationships
This document is in: Teaghlach agus Caidrimh > Fadhbanna pósta agus caidrimh eile
Most Read in "Housing"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Tithíocht"
Applying for local authority/social housing
Iarratas a dhéanamh ar thithíocht shóisialta/údaráis áitiúil
If your landlord wants you to leave
Má theastaíonn ó do thiarna talún go bhfágfadh tú an teach nó an t-árasan
